TOOL OF THE WEEK — Inkscape

2025-11-02   •   CREATIVITY   •   linux, mac, windows

Vector graphics editor for scalable artwork and icon design.

  • License: GPL-3.0
  • Repo / Site: https://inkscape.org
  • Tags: vector, graphics, design
Why it matters:
Open-source vector editor. Fast enough for most designer workflows, exportable SVGs, scriptable.
Mastodon post (copy): 
Inkscape — vector graphics editor. Open, cross-platform, no cost. https://inkscape.org #OpenSource #FOSS #TechnoBrutalism

Short notes / quick start

  • Run: install from distro package manager or download for Windows/Mac
  • Export: SVG, PDF, PNG

Links

  • Official: https://inkscape.org
  • Repo: https://gitlab.com/inkscape/inkscape
